languages.text: Отринув соблазны, одолевавшие его, Каллигос Винтерскейл вернулся в свои владения и принялся собирать то немногое, что осталось от его протектората. До последнего дня дела и мысли его были посвящены спасению брошенных миров и защите уцелевших подданных. Увы, за отпущенный ему срок достичь удалось немногого. Он испустил дух на троне, с которого не вставал десятилетия, категорически отказываясь от аугментаций, что вернули бы его ногам подвижность и силу.

Resisting the temptations that besieged him, Calligos Winterscale returned to his domain and began to piece together the shattered remains of his protectorate. Until his dying day, his actions and thoughts were dedicated to saving abandoned worlds and protecting survivors. Alas, he was not able to achieve much in the time he was allotted. He breathed his last breath on the same throne that he refused to leave for decades, adamantly refusing augmetics that would restore mobility and power to his legs.
languages.original_text: Отринув соблазны, одолевавшие его, Каллигос Винтерскейл вернулся в свои владения и принялся собирать то немногое, что осталось от его протектората. До последнего дня дела и мысли его были посвящены спасению брошенных миров и защите уцелевших подданных. Увы, за отпущенный ему срок достичь удалось немногого. Он испустил дух на троне, с которого не вставал десятилетия, категорически отказываясь от аугментаций, что вернули бы его ногам подвижность и силу.

traits.locale_text: Rejecting the temptations that besieged him, Calligos Winterscale returned to his domain and began to recollect the shattered remains of his protectorate. Until the last day, his actions and thoughts were dedicated to saving the abandoned worlds and protecting surviving subjects. Alas, he was not able to achieve much in the time he was allotted. He breathed out his last breath on the throne, he did not leave for decades, adamantly refusing to install any augmentics that would bring his legs' movement and power back.

Rejecting the temptations that besieged him, Calligos Winterscale returned to his domain and began to recollect the shattered remains of his protectorate. Until the last day, his actions and thoughts were dedicated to saving the abandoned worlds and protecting surviving subjects. Alas, he was not able to achieve much in the time he was allotted. He breathed out his last breath on the throne, he did not leave for decades, adamantly refusing to install any augmentics that would bring his legs' movement and power back.

Resisting the temptations that besieged him, Calligos Winterscale returned to his domain and began to piece together again the shattered remains of his protectorate. Until his dying day, his actions and thoughts were dedicated to saving abandoned worlds and protecting survivors. Alas, he was not able to achieve much in the time he was allotted. He breathed his last breath on the same throne that he refused to leave for decades, adamantly refusing augmetics that would restore mobility and power to his legs.

He breathed his last breath on the same throne that he refused to leave for decades, adamantly refusing augmetics that would restore mobility and power to his legs.

Until his dying day, his actions and thoughts were dedicated to saving abandoned worlds and protecting survivors. Alas, he was not able to achieve much in the time he was allotted. He breathed his last breath on the same throne that he refused to leave for decades, adamantly refusing augmetics that would restore mobility and power to his legs.

Until his dying day, his actions and thoughts were dedicated to saving abandoned worlds and protecting survivors. Alas, he was not able to achieve much in the time he was allotted. He breathed his last breath on the same throne that he refused to leave for decades, adamantly refusing augmetics that would restore mobility and power to his legs.

languages.text: 卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔抵挡住了身边的各种诱惑，回到了他的领地，开始拼凑他那破碎的王朝。直到他去世的那一天，他都全身心地致力于拯救那些被抛弃的世界，保护幸存者。遗憾的是，他所剩的时间有限，无法完成太多事情。他断然拒绝了一切可以让他恢复活力、再次恢复行动能力的植入物。在接下来的数十年里，他始终端坐在他的王座之上，片刻都不曾离开，直至生命的最后一刻。
languages.original_text: Resisting the temptations that besieged him, Calligos Winterscale returned to his domain and began to piece together the shattered remains of his protectorate. Until his dying day, his actions and thoughts were dedicated to saving abandoned worlds and protecting survivors. Alas, he was not able to achieve much in the time he was allotted. He breathed his last breath on the same throne that he refused to leave for decades, adamantly refusing augmetics that would restore mobility and power to his legs.

traits.locale_text: 卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔抵挡住了身边的各种诱惑，回到了他的领地，开始重新拼凑他那破碎的王朝。直到他去世的那一天，他都全身心地致力于拯救那些被抛弃的世界，保护幸存者。遗憾的是，他所剩的时间有限，无法完成太多事情。他断然拒绝了一切可以让他恢复活力、再次恢复行动能力的植入物。在接下来的数十年里，他始终端坐在他的王座之上，片刻都不曾离开，直至生命的最后一刻。

languages.text: Calligos Winterzunder widerstand den Versuchungen, die ihn belagerten, kehrte in sein Reich zurück und begann, die zertrümmerten Überreste seines Protektorats wieder zusammenzusetzen. Bis zum Tag seines Todes galten all seine Taten und Gedanken nur noch dem Ziel, verlassene Welten zu retten und Überlebende zu beschützen. Leider konnte er in der Zeit, die ihm blieb, jedoch nicht viel erreichen. Er tat seinen letzten Atemzug auf demselben Thron, den er sich jahrzehntelang zu verlassen geweigert hatte, kategorisch jede Augmentation ablehnend, die seine Beine wieder funktionsfähig gemacht hätte.
languages.original_text: Resisting the temptations that besieged him, Calligos Winterscale returned to his domain and began to piece together the shattered remains of his protectorate. Until his dying day, his actions and thoughts were dedicated to saving abandoned worlds and protecting survivors. Alas, he was not able to achieve much in the time he was allotted. He breathed his last breath on the same throne that he refused to leave for decades, adamantly refusing augmetics that would restore mobility and power to his legs.

traits.locale_text: Calligos Winterzunder widerstand den Versuchungen, die ihn belagerten, kehrte in sein Reich zurück und begann, die zertrümmerten Überreste seines Protektorats wieder zusammenzusetzen. Bis zum Tag seines Todes galten all seine Taten und Gedanken nur noch dem Ziel, verlassene Welten zu retten und Überlebende zu beschützen. Leider konnte er in der Zeit, die ihm blieb, jedoch nicht viel erreichen. Er tat seinen letzten Atemzug auf demselben Thron, den er sich jahrzehntelang zu verlassen geweigert hatte, kategorisch jede Augmentation ablehnend, die seine Beine wieder funktionsfähig gemacht hätte.

languages.text: Résistant aux tentations qui l'assiégeaient, Calligos Winterscale retourna dans son domaine et commença à rebâtir les ruines de son protectorat. Jusqu'à son dernier jour, il consacra toutes ses actions et ses pensées au sauvetage de mondes abandonnés et à la protection des survivants. Hélas, il n'accomplit pas grand-chose pendant le temps qui lui avait été alloué. Il rendit son dernier souffle sur le trône qu'il avait refusé de quitter pendant des décennies, rejetant catégoriquement les augmétiques qui auraient pu redonner mobilité et force à ses jambes.
languages.original_text: Resisting the temptations that besieged him, Calligos Winterscale returned to his domain and began to piece together the shattered remains of his protectorate. Until his dying day, his actions and thoughts were dedicated to saving abandoned worlds and protecting survivors. Alas, he was not able to achieve much in the time he was allotted. He breathed his last breath on the same throne that he refused to leave for decades, adamantly refusing augmetics that would restore mobility and power to his legs.

traits.locale_text: Résistant aux tentations qui l'assiégeaient, Calligos Winterscale retourna dans son domaine et commença à rebâtir les ruines de son protectorat. Jusqu'à son dernier jour, il consacra toutes ses actions et ses pensées au sauvetage de mondes abandonnés et à la protection des survivants. Hélas, il n’accomplit pas grand-chose pendant le temps qui lui avait été alloué. Il rendit son dernier souffle sur le trône qu'il avait refusé de quitter pendant des décennies, rejetant catégoriquement les augmétiques qui auraient pu redonner mobilité et force à ses jambes.

languages.text: Calligos Winterscale se resistió a las tentaciones que le asaltaban y volvió a sus dominios para recomponer los restos destrozados de su protectorado. Hasta su último día, dedicó cada acción y pensamiento a salvar los mundos abandonados y proteger a los supervivientes. Tristemente, no logró conseguir mucho en el poco tiempo que le quedaba. Exhaló su último aliento en el mismo trono que se negó a abandonar durante décadas, rechazando con tozudez los auméticos que podían devolver la movilidad a sus piernas.
languages.original_text: Resisting the temptations that besieged him, Calligos Winterscale returned to his domain and began to piece together the shattered remains of his protectorate. Until his dying day, his actions and thoughts were dedicated to saving abandoned worlds and protecting survivors. Alas, he was not able to achieve much in the time he was allotted. He breathed his last breath on the same throne that he refused to leave for decades, adamantly refusing augmetics that would restore mobility and power to his legs.

traits.locale_text: Calligos Winterscale se resistió a las tentaciones que le asaltaban y volvió a sus dominios para recomponer los restos destrozados de su protectorado. Hasta su último día, dedicó cada acción y pensamiento a salvar los mundos abandonados y proteger a los supervivientes. Tristemente, no logró conseguir mucho en el poco tiempo que le quedaba. Exhaló su último aliento en el mismo trono que se negó a abandonar durante décadas, rechazando con tozudez los auméticos que podían devolver la movilidad a sus piernas.

languages.text: カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは、襲いかかる誘惑に耐えながら自分の領地に戻り、粉々になった保護領の残骸を再びつなぎ合わせ始めた。死の間際まで、彼の行動と思考は見捨てられた世界の救済と生存者の保護に捧げられた。しかし残念なことに、彼は与えられた時間の中で多くを成し遂げることはできなかった。彼は何十年も離れようとしなかった玉座の上で息を引き取り、脚の可動性とパワーを回復させるオーグメティックを断固として拒否した。
languages.original_text: Resisting the temptations that besieged him, Calligos Winterscale returned to his domain and began to piece together the shattered remains of his protectorate. Until his dying day, his actions and thoughts were dedicated to saving abandoned worlds and protecting survivors. Alas, he was not able to achieve much in the time he was allotted. He breathed his last breath on the same throne that he refused to leave for decades, adamantly refusing augmetics that would restore mobility and power to his legs.

traits.locale_text: カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは、襲いかかる誘惑に耐えながら自分の領地に戻り、粉々になった保護領の残骸を再びつなぎ合わせ始めた。死の間際まで、彼の行動と思考は見捨てられた世界の救済と生存者の保護に捧げられた。しかし残念なことに、彼は与えられた時間の中で多くを成し遂げることはできなかった。彼は何十年も離れようとしなかった玉座の上で息を引き取り、脚の可動性とパワーを回復させるオーグメティックを断固として拒否した。

languages.text: Onu dört bir yandan kuşatan arzulara direnen Calligos Winterscale, diyarına geri döndü ve protektorasından artakalan parçaları bir araya getirmeye başladı. Öldüğü güne kadar tüm eylemleri ve düşünceleri, terk edilmiş dünyaları kurtarmak ve hayatta kalanları korumak üzerineydi. Maalesef kalan ömründe çok fazla şey başaramadı. Hareket kabiliyetini geri kazandıracak ve bacaklarını yeniden güçlendirecek ogmetikleri inatla reddetti ve son nefesini, on yıllar boyunca terk etmeyi reddettiği tahtın üzerinde verdi.

Until his dying day, his actions and thoughts were dedicated to saving abandoned worlds and protecting survivors. Alas, he was not able to achieve much in the time he was allotted. He breathed his last breath on the same throne that he refused to leave for decades, adamantly refusing augmetics that would restore mobility and power to his legs.

Öldüğü güne kadar tüm eylemleri ve düşünceleri, terk edilmiş dünyaları kurtarmak ve hayatta kalanları korumak üzerineydi. Maalesef kalan ömründe çok fazla şey başaramadı. Hareket kabiliyetini geri kazandıracak ve bacaklarını yeniden güçlendirecek ogmetikleri inatla reddetti ve son nefesini, on yıllar boyunca terk etmeyi reddettiği tahtın üzerinde verdi.
